comment.author: 23150614@N06
comment._content: State funeral of Maurice Berteaux, French Minister of War, born 1852, died 1911. Minister of War between 2nd March 1911 and 21 May 1911. Biography : www.maisonslaffitte.net/MauriceBerteaux.htm (french)

comment.author: 23623601@N03
comment._content: The very strange circumstances of Berteaux's death can be found here: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A01E6D81031E2... See also: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA0B17F93B5517738...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The accident occurred on May 21, 1911. This photo was taken at the funeral, on May 26, 1911. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9407EFD81031E233A... Here is another Bain/LOC photo -- this one showing Monis, who was at the field, and was injured in the mishap. Perhaps this was taken before the accident? www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162678253/in/p...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan:  Thanks for finding the date for us.  We'll add it to the description next time we update the record.
